Sentencas: Ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) power generation systems are very promising owing to their high efficiency and ease of fuel storage.
Titulo: Parametric study of a high-performance ammonia-fed SOFC standalone system

Sentencas: However, understanding the complexity of fuel cell stacks and systems supplied by ammonia remains challenging.
Titulo: Parametric study of a high-performance ammonia-fed SOFC standalone system

Sentencas: Therefore, it is proposed to investigate the standalone SOFC system to clearly elucidate the behavior of the stack and realize facile implementation.
Titulo: Parametric study of a high-performance ammonia-fed SOFC standalone system

Sentencas: In this study, the stack was modeled and validated using experimental data to confirm its output characteristics.
Titulo: Parametric study of a high-performance ammonia-fed SOFC standalone system

Sentencas: The system efficiency was then calculated under various operating conditions, such as current density, fuel utilization, and stack in/out temperature.
Titulo: Parametric study of a high-performance ammonia-fed SOFC standalone system

Sentencas: The results show that the system efficiency is approximately 54 % and is highly dependent on fuel utilization and current density but not on temperature differences.
Titulo: Parametric study of a high-performance ammonia-fed SOFC standalone system

Sentencas: However, the system can only operate at a temperature difference of 65 degrees C or higher owing to the effectiveness of the heat exchanger on the fuel side.
Titulo: Parametric study of a high-performance ammonia-fed SOFC standalone system
